    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.

    FeedActivity
    FeedActivity is an activity that displays the mood history of a user.
    FeedActivityUITest
    Test class for FeedActivity using Espresso framework.
    FeedManager
    FeedManager is a utility class responsible for managing following data in Firestore.
    FeedManager.FeedCallback
    Callback interface for fetching mood history.
    FeedManager.FollowingCallback
    Callback interface for fetching the following list.
    Filter
    The Filter class provides utility methods for filtering mood history based on different criteria such as time, emotional state, keywords, and location proximity.
    FollowerListAdapter
    This adapter handles the individual followers.
    FollowerListFragment
    The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the follower list.
    FollowingListAdapter
    This adapter handles displaying the contents of the followingList into the listView.
    FollowingListFragment
    The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the following list.
    FollowRequestAdapter
    This adapter handles the individual follow requests.
    FollowRequestFragment
    The purpose of this fragment is to handle the listView Fragment for the follow requests.
    HomePageActivity
    The HomePageActivity serves as the main landing page after the user logs in or signs up.
    LocationHelper
    This class helps in obtaining the user's location using Google's FusedLocationProviderClient.
    LocationHelper.LocationListener
    Interface to provide callbacks for location updates or errors.
    LocationMapActivity
    Displays the map for filtered mood feed,history, and 5k

    SearchActivity
    SearchActivity allows the user to use a search interface for finding other users profiles This class interacts with the following components: - UserAdapter: Displays the user results in a recycler view - User: Model for the users information - NavBarFragment: Provides navigation capabilities
